question:
Match the stages of prophase I given in Column-I with their features in Column-ll and choose the correct options from the choices given below:

| Column - I | Column - II |
|---|---|
| (a) Leptotene | (i) Exchange of genetic materials between non-sister chromatids |
| (b) Zygotene | (ii) Chromosomes visible under light microscope |
| (c) Pachytene | (iii) Dissolution of synaptonemal complex |
| (d) Diplotene | (iv) Chromosomes start pairing together |
| (e) Diakinesis | (v) Terminalisation of chiasmata |
explanation: Leptotene (ii - visible), Zygotene (iv - pairing/synapsis), Pachytene (i - crossing over), Diplotene (iii - dissolution of synaptonemal complex), Diakinesis (v - terminalisation).
